clinical_study.brief_title: Assessing the Surgical Skills of Trainees in Learning the LDG
clinical_study.official_title: Assessing the Surgical Skills of Trainees in Learning the Laparoscopic Distal Gastrectomy

brief_summary.textblock: Laparoscopic distal gastrectomy (LDG) is a common surgery in the surgical trainees. However, there is no assessment system to measuring the surgical skill of surgical trainees. The novel surgical assessment system, which called Global Operative Assessment of Laparoscopic Skills-Distal Gastrectomy (GOALS-DG) by the task analysis and the Delphi method have been developed. This study describes assessing the development of surgical skill by GOALS-DG in the initial experience of LDG.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessing the development of surgical skill by GOALS-DG in the initial experience of LDG.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of the educational study for 3 years.
primary_outcome.description: The surgical skill and performance of LDG was scored using GOALS-DG by a trainee and an instructor. The difference in mean surgical performance score of GOALS-DG was evaluated in tree phase. The score about GOALS-DG is evaluated on a three or two level scale ( 28items in B-1 reconstruction or 31items in R-Y reconstruction). Maximum of total score is 46 in B-1 reconstruction or 52 in R-Y reconstruction. High score is good surgical skill. Low score is poor surgical skill.

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessing the value of surgical skill by GOALS-DG in the initial experience of LDG and surgical outcome.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of the educational study for 3 years.
secondary_outcome.description: Operation time, bleeding , Postoperative complications are compared with average of total score of GOALS-DG. The score about GOALS-DG is evaluated on a three or two level scale ( 28items in B-1 reconstruction or 31items in R-Y reconstruction). Maximum of total score is 46 in B-1 reconstruction or 52 in R-Y reconstruction. High score is good surgical skill. Low score is poor surgical skill.

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessing the value of surgical skill by GOALS-DG in the initial experience of LDG and surgical outcome.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of the educational study for 3 years.
secondary_outcome.description: Procedures` time in each items of LDG was evaluated for difficulty of surgical technics. The scoring rates in each items of LDG are compared with Procedures` time. The average of score about GOALS-DG is evaluated on a three or two level scale ( 28items in B-1 reconstruction or 31items in R-Y reconstruction). High score is good surgical skill. Low score is poor surgical skill.

arm_group.description: Participants in GOALS-DG Group score the performance of procedure after LDG.

intervention.description: Sequential validating Global Operative Assessment of Laparoscopic Skills-Distal Gastrectomy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Laparoscopic distal gastrectomy to early gastric cancer
- D1 plus lymphadenectomy
- Provide signed informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- postoperative conditions affecting LDG
- pregnancy
- advanced gastric cancer
- D2 lymphadenectomy
- Total or subtotal gastrectomy
- unsuitable condition
